Package ch.thomasmueller.saltyfiles.ui.command

Interface Summary
Command Each class implementing this interface must publish its classname by adding it as a constant value in the class CommandFactory.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSwitchCommand Switches between encryption and decryption mode.
ChooseDecryptionSourceArchiveCommand Opens a FileChooser to select a file to be decrypted.
ChooseDecryptionTargetDirCommand Opens a FileChooser to select a target directory.
ChooseEncryptionSourceFilesCommand Opens a FileChooser to select a file or directory encrypted.
ChooseEncryptionTargetDirCommand Opens a FileChooser to select a target directory.
CommandFactory Factory to create Commands and publish their class-names.
ExitCommand Command used to exit the program.
ShowAboutCommand Shows the About Dialog.
ShowConfigCommand  
SwitchDecryptModesCommand Switch all Controls enabled used for decrytion and disable those used for encryption.
SwitchEncryptModesCommand Switch all Controls disabled used for decrytion and enable those used for encryption.
TransformCommand This is Command implementing the main task of the application.
